TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContainerVisual extends System.Windows.Media.Visual

summary.span: 管理 物件的集合。

span.span: Manages a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會當做容器使用的集合物件。The class is used as a container for a collection of objects. 類別衍生自類別，使得類別也可以包含視覺物件的集合。The class derives from the class, such that the class can also contain a collection of visual objects. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立做為兩個父代的物件物件。The following example shows how to create a object that is used as the parent for two objects. 若要加入的物件必須反向疊置順序 （從下至上） 加入物件，以確保它們會呈現正確的繪圖順序。Objects that are added to the object must be added in reverse z-order (bottom to top) to ensure they are rendering in the correct drawing order. 為了讓正確列舉的視覺化樹狀結構，這個範例將提供的覆寫的實作方法和屬性。In order for the visual tree to be enumerated correctly, the example provides overridden implementations of the method and property. [!code-csharp[ContainerVisualHost#ContainerVisualHost01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContainerVisualHost/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#containervisualhost01)] [!code-vb[ContainerVisualHost#ContainerVisualHost01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContainerVisualHost/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#containervisualhost01)]

param.name: filterCallback
param.span: 委派，可讓您忽略點擊測試結果中處理時不感興趣的視覺化樹狀結構組件。

span.span: The delegate that allows you to ignore parts of the visual tree that you are not interested in processing in your hit test results.

param.name: resultCallback
param.span: 用來控制如何傳回點擊測試資訊的委派。

span.span: The delegate that is used to control the return of hit test information.

param.name: hitTestParameters
param.span: 定義點擊測試的參數集。

span.span: Defines the set of parameters for a hit test.

summary.span: 使用 和 物件，對 起始點擊測試。

span.span: Initiates a hit test on the by using the and objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `filterCallback`參數可以是 null，在此情況下，它會被忽略。The `filterCallback` parameter can be null, in which case, it is ignored. 如果`filterCallback`不`null`，它會叫用之前`resultCallback`。If `filterCallback` is not `null`, it is invoked before `resultCallback`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Opacity { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 的不透明度 (根據 0=透明，1=不透明)。

span.span: Gets or sets the opacity of the , based on 0=transparent, 1=opaque.

value.span: 從 0 到 1 的值，指定的範圍為完全透明到完全不透明。

span.span: A value from 0 through 1 that specifies a range from fully transparent to fully opaque.

value.span: 值為 0 表示 完全透明，值為 1 則表示 完全不透明。

span.span: A value of 0 indicates that the is completely transparent, while a value of 1 indicates that the is completely opaque.

value.span: 值為 0.5 表示半透明，值為 0.725 則表示 72.5% 不透明，依此類推。

span.span: A value 0.5 indicates 50 percent opaque, a value of 0.725 indicates 72.5 percent opaque, and so on.

value.span: 小於 0 的值視為 0，而大於 1 的值則視為 1。

span.span: Values less than 0 are treated as 0, while values greater than 1 are treated as 1.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ OpacityMask { System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定筆刷，這個筆刷指定 可能的不透明遮罩。

span.span: Gets or sets a brush that specifies a possible opacity mask for the .

value.span: 型別 的值，表示 的不透明遮罩值。

span.span: A value of type that represents the opacity mask value of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不透明度遮罩可以用來建立這類 vignettes，根據的筆刷的 alpha 色板值。Opacity masks can be used to create effects such as vignettes, based on the alpha channel values of the brush.

The parent of the visual.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，這會當做傳回，而不是原始物件。Note that this is returned as , rather than a raw object. 這個屬性可能會傳回`null`在中斷連線的樹狀目錄中，或如果您有周遊樹狀結構根目錄視窗層級。This property might return `null` in a disconnected tree, or if you have traversed to the tree root at the window level.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ XSnappingGuidelines { System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 的 X (水平) 導線。

span.span: Gets or sets the X (horizontal) guideline for the .
The horizontal guideline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像素貼齊是使裝置特定像素呈現物件邊緣內容版面配置固定的程序。Pixel snapping is the process in which content layout is fixed so that object edges are rendered on device-specific pixels. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 圖形系統會使用裝置獨立單位來啟用解析度和裝置獨立性。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] graphics system uses device-independent units to enable resolution and device independence. 每個裝置獨立像素都會依系統的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] 設定自動進行調整。Each device independent pixel automatically scales with the system's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] setting. 這讓 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 應用程式針對不同的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] 設定進行適當調整，並自動讓應用程式感知 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]。This provides [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications proper scaling for different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] settings and makes the application automatically [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-aware. 不過，這[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]獨立性可以建立異常的邊緣轉譯，因為消除鋸齒。However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] independence can create irregular edge rendering due to anti-aliasing. 這些成品，通常被視為模糊或 「 軟式 」 的邊緣，就會發生的邊緣位置落在裝置像素，而不是裝置像素之間。These artifacts, commonly seen as blurry, or "soft" edges, can occur when the location of an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel rather than between device pixels. 若要解決此問題，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]提供方法的 「 對齊 」 裝置像素，透過像素貼齊、 貼至視覺化樹狀結構中的物件邊緣消除柔和消除鋸齒所產生的邊界。To address this issue, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a way for object edges in a visual tree to "snap" to device pixels through pixel snapping, eliminating the soft edges produced by anti-aliasing.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ YSnappingGuidelines { System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::DoubleCollection ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 的 Y (垂直) 導線。

span.span: Gets or sets the Y (vertical) guideline for the .
The vertical guideline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像素貼齊是使裝置特定像素呈現物件邊緣內容版面配置固定的程序。Pixel snapping is the process in which content layout is fixed so that object edges are rendered on device-specific pixels. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 圖形系統會使用裝置獨立單位來啟用解析度和裝置獨立性。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] graphics system uses device-independent units to enable resolution and device independence. 每個裝置獨立像素都會依系統的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] 設定自動進行調整。Each device independent pixel automatically scales with the system's [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)] setting. 這讓 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 應用程式針對不同的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] 設定進行適當調整，並自動讓應用程式感知 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]。This provides [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications proper scaling for different [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] settings and makes the application automatically [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]-aware. 不過，這[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)]獨立性可以建立異常的邊緣轉譯，因為消除鋸齒。However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_dpi](~/includes/tla2sharptla-dpi-md.md)] independence can create irregular edge rendering due to anti-aliasing. 這些成品，通常被視為模糊或 「 軟式 」 的邊緣，就會發生的邊緣位置落在裝置像素，而不是裝置像素之間。These artifacts, commonly seen as blurry, or "soft" edges, can occur when the location of an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel rather than between device pixels. 若要解決此問題，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]提供方法的 「 對齊 」 裝置像素，透過像素貼齊、 貼至視覺化樹狀結構中的物件邊緣消除柔和消除鋸齒所產生的邊界。To address this issue, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a way for object edges in a visual tree to "snap" to device pixels through pixel snapping, eliminating the soft edges produced by anti-aliasing.
